## Gene Details:

- **Gene Symbol:** <u>GH3.15</u>
- **Gene Name:** Gretchen Hagen 3.15
- **Description:**   Auxin-responsive GH3 family protein;(source:Araport11)
- **TAIR Accession:** locus:2181630
- **Genome:** [Araport11_genome_release](https://www.arabidopsis.org/download/list?dir=Genes%2FAraport11_genome_release)
- **Species:** *Arabidopsis thaliana*

## Germplasm Phenotype:
   - [SALK_079153 homozygous]()&nbsp;---&nbsp;slight reduction in root length as compared to wild type when grown for 18 days on 8 uM IBA.
